maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastmeshwrapper.cpp
/*

Use of this software is subject to the terms of the Autodesk license agreement
provided at the time of installation or download, or which otherwise 
accompanies this software in either electronic or hard copy form.

#include "beastwrappers/beastmeshwrapper.h"

namespace beastmaya {

void BeastMesh::addVertexData( const ILBVec3* vertexData, const ILBVec3* normalData, int32 vertexCount )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBAddVertexData(obj(), vertexData, normalData, vertexCount));
}

void BeastMesh::beginTangents()
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBBeginTangents(obj()));
}

void BeastMesh::endTangents()
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBEndTangents(obj()));
}

void BeastMesh::addTangentData( const ILBVec3* tangentData, const ILBVec3* bitangentData, int32 tangentCount )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBAddTangentData(obj(), tangentData, bitangentData, tangentCount));
}

void BeastMesh::beginUVLayer( ILBConstString name )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBBeginUVLayer(obj(), name));
}

void BeastMesh::endUVLayer()
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBEndUVLayer(obj()));
}

void BeastMesh::addUVData( const ILBVec2* uvData, int32 uvCount )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBAddUVData(obj(), uvData, uvCount));
}

void BeastMesh::beginMaterialGroup( ILBConstString name )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBBeginMaterialGroup(obj(), name));
}

void BeastMesh::addTriangleData( const int32* data, int size )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBAddTriangleData(obj(), data, size));
}

void BeastMesh::endMaterialGroup()
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBEndMaterialGroup(obj()));
}

void BeastMesh::endMesh()
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBEndMesh(obj()));
}

}
Please send us your comment about this page
